chapters.title: Chapter 48: A Brilliant LanceChapter 49: Light and ShadowEpilogue: To See the Answer
chapters.info: Elswell, p. 896—Aes Sedai of unknown Ajah. She is trying to convince Rodel Ituralde to take the Throne of Arad Doman now that Alsalam is dead. She argues that stability in Arad Doman is particularly important now that Tenobia and the Bashere are dead, leaving Saldaea without a ruler.
